name: New Game Plus
description:
Note: If you experience lag or audio crackling on the web build, try the download build at the bottom of the game page.

You've all played Bird Quest, but have you ever wondered how it was made?

Video game development isn't simple, and it can be difficult to come up with a good game idea. However, thanks to the feedback from focus groups, you can have someone else design the game for you!

Description:

In this interactive timeline of Bird Quest's development, you will play through several alpha builds and see how they were changed based on feedback from play testers.

Made in 3 days for Mini Jam 105: Dreamy: Every Playthrough is Unique
